Draft Rating:

C+

Monte McNair ranks in the 53th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. McNair's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Tyrese Haliburton with 12th pick but was worth 1th pick.
  • Drafted Jahmi'us Ramsey with 43th pick but was worth 24th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Davion Mitchell with 9th pick but was worth 55th pick.
  • Drafted Keegan Murray with 4th pick but was worth 21th pick.

Trade Rating:

C

Monte McNair ranks in the 50th percentile for trading among executives in our database. That's basically average. It could be worse though lol.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Delon Wright to SAC.
  • Lost Cory Joseph, Luka Garza to DET.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Justin Holiday, Jeremy Lamb, Domantas Sabonis, Jordan Walsh to SAC.
  • Lost Tyrese Haliburton, Buddy Hield, Tristan Thompson to IND.

Signing Rating:

B+

Monte McNair ranks in the 78th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Malik Monk in 2022.
  • Signed Damian Jones in 2021.
  • Signed Keon Ellis in 2022.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Chimezie Metu in 2020.
  • Signed Maurice Harkless in 2021.
  • Signed Alex Len in 2021.
